name: rabexd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(c0, universe, crab(s0, c1, w1), w0)
stmt.pretty: syl5eqel(c0, universe, { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe), wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w1), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Separation Scheme in terms of a restricted class abstraction, deduction form of ~ rabex2 . (Contributed by AV, 16-Jul-2019.)
